attributes.action: Make any infomation obtained by any UK government space missions open to public scrutiny
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We pay our taxes to send devices into space and - in the future - people. Any images or data obtained in these missions should be availible on government websites as there is no reasonable reason for such infomation to be withheld. I would also like the government to encourage the US government to do the same.
